name: catalog
description: Catalog Integration - Manage data catalogs, collections, and master data through MCP

settings.name: Catalog API Key
settings.description: Your API key for Catalog (e.g., catalog_ak_...)

settings.name: Catalog API Domain
settings.description: The domain endpoint for the Catalog API (optional, defaults)

settings.name: Catalog API URI
settings.description: The URI suffix for the Catalog API (optional, defaults to /v1/catalog)

settings.name: Session ID
settings.description: The session ID for the Catalog API
